description: For many parents, the prospect of paying for a child’s college education is daunting. A college degree today costs ten […]
contentencoded: For many parents, the prospect of paying for a child’s college education is daunting. A college degree today costs ten times what it did fifty years ago. In this podcast, we clear up some of the biggest misconceptions about paying for college with Carol Stack, co-author of The Financial Aid Handbook: Getting the Education You Want for the Price You Can Afford.

title: The Seven Biggest Myths About Paying for College
